name.ja: カラーバウンサー  Skill Game
name.th: นักเลงสี  Online Game

short.ar: Color Bouncer هي لعبة ألغاز HTML5 حيث يستخدم اللاعبون كرة لتدمير الحواجز الملونة.
short.am: Color Bouncer ተጫዋቾች ባለ ቀለም መሰናክሎችን ለማፍረስ ኳስ የሚጠቀሙበት HTML5 የእንቆቅልሽ ጨዋታ ነው።
short.bg: Color Bouncer е HTML5 пъзел игра, в която играчите използват топка, за да съборят цветни бариери.
short.bn: কালার বাউন্সার হল একটি HTML5 ধাঁধা খেলা যেখানে খেলোয়াড়রা একটি বল ব্যবহার করে রঙিন বাধা ছিঁড়ে ফেলে।
short.ca: Color Bouncer és un joc de trencaclosques HTML5 on els jugadors utilitzen una pilota per enderrocar barreres de colors.
short.cs: Color Bouncer je logická hra HTML5, kde hráči pomocí míče srážejí barevné bariéry.
short.da: Color Bouncer er et HTML5-puslespil, hvor spillere bruger en bold til at slå farvede barrierer ned.
short.de: Color Bouncer ist ein HTML5-Puzzlespiel, bei dem Spieler einen Ball verwenden, um farbige Barrieren niederzureißen.
short.el: Το Color Bouncer είναι ένα παιχνίδι παζλ HTML5 όπου οι παίκτες χρησιμοποιούν μια μπάλα για να γκρεμίσουν τα χρωματιστά εμπόδια.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,no,pt_BR,: Color Bouncer is an HTML5 puzzle game where players use a ball to knock down colored barriers.
short.es: Color Bouncer es un juego de rompecabezas HTML5 en el que los jugadores usan una pelota para derribar barreras de colores.
short.et: Color Bouncer on HTML5 puslemäng, kus mängijad kasutavad palli värviliste tõkete maha löömiseks.
short.fa: Color Bouncer یک بازی پازل HTML5 است که در آن بازیکنان از یک توپ برای از بین بردن موانع رنگی استفاده می کنند.
short.fi: Color Bouncer on HTML5-pulmapeli, jossa pelaajat kaatavat värillisiä esteitä pallolla.
short.fil: Ang Color Bouncer ay isang HTML5 puzzle game kung saan ang mga manlalaro ay gumagamit ng bola upang itumba ang mga may kulay na…
short.fr: Color Bouncer est un jeu de puzzle HTML5 où les joueurs utilisent une balle pour faire tomber des barrières colorées.
short.gu: કલર બાઉન્સર એ એક HTML5 પઝલ ગેમ છે જ્યાં ખેલાડીઓ રંગીન અવરોધોને પછાડવા માટે બોલનો ઉપયોગ કરે છે.
short.he: Colour Bouncer הוא משחק פאזל HTML5 שבו שחקנים משתמשים בכדור כדי להפיל מחסומים צבעוניים.
short.hi: कलर बाउंसर एक एचटीएमएल 5 पहेली गेम है जहां खिलाड़ी रंगीन बाधाओं को मारने के लिए गेंद का उपयोग करते हैं।
short.hr: Color Bouncer je HTML5 zagonetka u kojoj igrači koriste loptu za rušenje barijera u boji.
short.hu: A Color Bouncer egy HTML5-ös kirakós játék, amelyben a játékosok labdával döntik le a színes akadályokat.
short.id: Color Bouncer adalah game teka-teki HTML5 di mana pemain menggunakan bola untuk merobohkan penghalang berwarna.
short.it: Color Bouncer è un puzzle game HTML5 in cui i giocatori usano una palla per abbattere barriere colorate.
short.ja: Color Bouncer は、プレイヤーがボールを使って色付きのバリアを倒す HTML5 パズル ゲームです。
short.kn: ಕಲರ್ ಬೌನ್ಸರ್ ಒಂದು HTML5 ಪಝಲ್ ಗೇಮ್ ಆಗಿದ್ದು, ಆಟಗಾರರು ಬಣ್ಣದ ಅಡೆತಡೆಗಳನ್ನು ಉರುಳಿಸಲು ಚೆಂಡನ್ನು ಬಳಸುತ್ತಾರೆ.
short.ko: Color Bouncer는 플레이어가 공을 사용하여 유색 장벽을 무너뜨리는 HTML5 퍼즐 게임입니다.
short.lv: Color Bouncer ir HTML5 puzzle spēle, kurā spēlētāji izmanto bumbu, lai notriektu krāsainas barjeras.
short.ml: കളർ ബൗൺസർ എന്നത് ഒരു HTML5 പസിൽ ഗെയിമാണ്, അവിടെ കളിക്കാർ നിറമുള്ള തടസ്സങ്ങൾ തകർക്കാൻ ഒരു പന്ത് ഉപയോഗിക്കുന്നു.
short.mr: कलर बाउंसर हा एक HTML5 कोडे गेम आहे जेथे खेळाडू रंगीत अडथळे दूर करण्यासाठी बॉल वापरतात.
short.ms: Color Bouncer ialah permainan teka-teki HTML5 di mana pemain menggunakan bola untuk menjatuhkan halangan berwarna.
short.nl: Color Bouncer is een HTML5-puzzelspel waarin spelers een bal gebruiken om gekleurde barrières omver te werpen.
short.pl: Color Bouncer to gra logiczna HTML5, w której gracze używają piłki do przewracania kolorowych barier.
short.ro: Color Bouncer este un joc de puzzle HTML5 în care jucătorii folosesc o minge pentru a doborî barierele colorate.
short.ru: Color Bouncer — это игра-головоломка HTML5, в которой игроки используют мяч, чтобы сбивать цветные барьеры.
short.sk: Color Bouncer je logická hra HTML5, v ktorej hráči pomocou lopty zrážajú farebné bariéry.
short.sl: Color Bouncer je ugankarska igra HTML5, kjer igralci z žogo podirajo barvne ovire.
short.sw: Color Bouncer ni mchezo wa mafumbo wa HTML5 ambapo wachezaji hutumia mpira kuangusha vizuizi vya rangi.
short.ta: கலர் பவுன்சர் என்பது ஒரு HTML5 புதிர் விளையாட்டு ஆகும், இதில் வீரர்கள் வண்ணத் தடைகளைத் தட்டிச் செல்ல பந்தைப் பயன்படுத்துகின்றனர்.
short.te: కలర్ బౌన్సర్ అనేది HTML5 పజిల్ గేమ్, ఇక్కడ ఆటగాళ్ళు రంగు అడ్డంకులను పడగొట్టడానికి బంతిని ఉపయోగిస్తారు.
short.th: Color Bouncer เป็นเกมไขปริศนา HTML5 ที่ผู้เล่นใช้ลูกบอลเพื่อล้มสิ่งกีดขวางสี
short.tr: Color Bouncer, oyuncuların renkli engelleri yıkmak için top kullandığı bir HTML5 bulmaca oyunudur.
short.uk: Color Bouncer – це гра-головоломка HTML5, у якій гравці використовують м’яч, щоб збивати кольорові бар’єри.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color Bouncer is an HTML5 puzzle game where players use a ball to knock down colored barriers. It's a test coordination and aim. 

Color Bouncer is a fun and challenging HTML5 game that tests players' coordination and aim. In the game, players are given control of a small ball and must use it to knock down colored barriers by bouncing the ball off of them. The borders are arranged in various patterns on the screen, and players must aim carefully to hit them all.

The game's objective is to knock down all the barriers on the screen before the time runs out. As players progress through the game, the number and complexity of the obstacles increase, making it more difficult to knock them all down. To succeed, players must aim well and anticipate the ball's movements.

One of the unique features of Color Bouncer is its intuitive and easy-to-use controls. Players can aim and shoot the ball by clicking and dragging their mouse or finger. This allows for fast and fluid gameplay that is easy to pick up and play.

In addition to the standard game mode, Color Bouncer also includes a variety of challenging levels and game modes to keep players coming back for more. In the Puzzle mode, players must use their strategic thinking skills to solve increasingly tricky levels. Endlessly, players must stay alive for as long as possible, knocking down barriers quickly to keep the ball from bouncing off the screen.

Overall, Color Bouncer is a fun and addictive HTML5 game that keeps players entertained for hours. Its challenging gameplay, various game modes, and easy-to-use controls make it a must-play for anyone looking for a brain-teasing and engaging game.
